He shrugged and squezed into the tight undergarments and raced to his closet to put on some pants and a shirt. Ben wasn't a bad looking kid. In fact he probably would have been one of the cutest kids in his grade if it weren't for his weight. He wasn't HUGE...but he wasn't skinny either. Just chubby. He had black hair and on his pudgy cheeks were a bunch of freckles. His most prominant feature was his behind which protruded from his body as if he had shoved balloons in his pants. When he sat on his desk at school he could barely fit onto the chair. He rarely had clothes that fit because they only made jeans that were tall as well as wide, Ben was not tall by any means, so he usually wore sweatpants. He was out of clean sweatpants. He slipped into a pair of jeans and waddled downstairs. He grabbed a cupcake from the pantry and raced outside. He barely caught his bus as it pulled up. 132.content:
BIO
Tyson Kyle is your average high-school junior; he gets about a 3.2 Grade Point Average, Has a few friends, and drives a sporty 2009 Honda Fit. Tyson, however, has a problem. Tyson has a HUGE butt. When Tyson came to HHS as a freshmen, he wore size 34x30 pants and weighed 170 lbs, but has grown to fill out 38x32 pants and weigh 210 lbs his Junior year. For Tyson, It is both a blessing and a curse: People like to make fun of him for it, but some of his classmates actually like it. Tyson hasn't had a girlfriend since his freshmen year, but he hasn't dated anybody because he is TOO friendly and doesn't want to take his relationships to a higher level (because he doesn't want to be burned again). Tyson used to play sports, but after a minor knee injury in the 7th grade, he is unable to play sports and hurts himself when he tries. Tyson has a medium-sized build and a small belly, but his most prominent feature is his large butt. Tyson lives with his parents; John and Lauren, and one sister named Mandy, who goes to the junior high school just down the road from their house.

STORY
Tyson woke up after hitting the snooze button one too many times. He looked at the clock and it said '7:45', class started at 8 (and he still needed a shower). Tyson threw off his covers and ran to the bathroom in only his boxers. He banged on the door, exclaiming, "Mandy! I need a shower!"
"Just let me finish my hair," His sister retorted, "I'll be done in a second." Mandy usually takes a long time in the bathroom.
"I need in there NOW!" Tyson shouted, looking at the wall clock, "7:46." he muttered to himself. He looked back down and realized that he should grab some clothes, so he ran back to his room and grabbed some shorts, a shirt, a pair of boxers, and some socks. When he ran back to the bathroom, Mandy had already left. As he ran into the bathroom, he saw the clock say '7:49'. Tyson flipped the toilet seat down and dropped his clothes on top, but he didn't know whether to take a shower or to skip it.

Should He:
132.title: Tyson

1321.content:
Tyson, thinking fast, decided to take a shower, so he flipped the shower on to hot and pulled his boxers on. He turned around and realized that he had forgotten not only to lock the door, but to shut the door as well. He ran and slammed the door closed comically with his butt, then he locked it quickly. Tyson felt the water to see if it was warm, and it was, so he jumped in and soaked his hair, then he started soaping his hair up while turning to get his whole body soaked, then he flipped his head down to wash his hair while he soaped up the rest of his body, then he finished up washing himself and reached for his towel. When he turned, he slipped on a soapy spot and fell into the bath, pulling his towel with him. "Is everything okay? I heard a crash!" John, Tyson's dad, yelled.
"I'm fine, I just slipped." Tyson replied, annoyed that his towel was now soaked. Tyson turned off the water and slung his wet towel over the towel bar. He opened the closet and grabbed another towel and dried himself off. He turned and looked at the clock and realized that the time was:
1321.title: Tyson decided to take a really fast shower

13211.content:
Tyson looked at the clock and saw that the time was '7:53', So he had barely enough time to make it to school. He hurried and pulled on his boxers, struggling a little, and then his shorts, with which he struggled even more. He pulled the shorts back off and read the tag, "38, but they feel a little tight..." Tyson pulled them back on and they were, in fact, tight. he threw on the shirt, which wasn't a problem, and pulled on his socks. He then ran (rather, slid) into the kitchen and grabbed a blue-berry Pop-Tart and a bottle of water. He then ran back to his room and grabbed his Galaxy Note II, keys, and shoes. He then pulled his shoes on and ran to his car, turning the key in the ignition and looking at the on-board clock, '7:55'. "I have five minutes to get there!" Tyson exclaimed as he tore open the Pop-Tart bag and pulled out of the driveway. As he drove, he ate the Pop-Tarts. "Too dry," he stated to himself, opening the water and taking a gulp, "that's better."
As he pulled into the 'Junior' student section of the parking lot, he grabbed his books and tried to jump out of the car, forgetting his seat belt. As he tried to pull himself out, the seat belt tightened and forced him to drop his books. "Fuc- er..." He stops himself as he sees another student passing him, staring at him. "Hows it going?" Tyson says, to which the other student walks off. "Idiot..." Tyson mutters to himself, undoing his seat belt and picking up his books. He then runs up to the main entrance and towards his first class, hearing some girls giggle and some guys shouting. As Tyson walks into the classroom, the bell rings and he takes his seat.
"So close." His friend Cameron mutters loud enough for Tyson to hear.
"Shut up, Cam" Tyson responds, laughing. He then tries to reach into his pocket, his shorts extremely tight, and grabs his phone, turning it to vibrate.
"Those shorts aren't gonna hold up for long." Cameron snickers.
"I don't know what's up, its like I had a 'growth spurt' overnight." Tyson jokes, to which both the teens laugh.
"Yeah, dude, what is with that?"
"What's with what?"
"The fact that you have a huge..." Cameron trailed off, the teacher and half the class staring at him.
Tyson couldn't contain his laughter, he and a couple other guys bust up laughing and Cameron hid his face in his book.
"I'm sorry dude, that is just really embarrassing." Tyson tried to console Cameron, but he got up and left the classroom.
"What was he saying? He likes your huge ass?" someone in the class shouted as Cameron left the room, the classroom roared with laughter. Tyson told the teacher he was going to check up on his friend. The teacher responded by waving him off, as if to sign 'Go ahead'.

Tyson walked out of the classroom and tracked down Cameron, "Go away." Cameron told Tyson
"I just came out here to check up on you."
"They think that I like you now."

What should Tyson say?
13211.title: 7:53, just enough time left! or

132112.content:
"They think that I like you now." Cameron plainly stated
"Well..." Tyson wondered
"Well what?" Cameron slowly turned back to face Tyson
"Do you?" Tyson asked. Cameron looked at Tyson for a little while and said nothing. Tyson felt kinda awkward at this moment, so he got up.
"I'm sorry." Tyson said
"Don't be sorry," Cameron said, "Because..."

What will Cameron Say?
132112.title: "Well, do you?"

choices: Go to practice and enjoy being with his bros.

135.content:
Kyle is your dream jock. Any gay would dream to get with him.
Good looks, not too much of a bro, and a fantastic body.
Devoted to athletics, his grades suffer. He’s not necessarily the brightest lightbulb in the box.

School had just ended; football practice starts in 10 minutes. As he’s walking to the athletic center, he gets a voicemail from Sophie, his new girlfriend. They’ve only dated for 2 weeks.
He listens to the voicemail.;
“We should talk, tonight!”
Dang she sounds mad, Kyle realized. He needs to see what’s wrong but he really doesn’t want to miss practice. What should he do?
135.title: Kyle
